channel.title: mysql on 后会有期
channel.description: Recent content in mysql on 后会有期

item.title: Centos和windows server2003搭建apache php ssdb环境
item.description: centos安装 apache php mysql yum install httpd yum install php php-mysql yum install mysql mysql-server vi /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf /etc/init.d/httpd start /etc/init.d/mysqld start centos安装ssdb yum install wget wget –no-check-certificate https://github.com/ideawu/ssdb/archive/master.zip yum install unzip zip umzip master.zip cd ssdb-master yum install autoconf yum install g++ gcc+ gcc-c++ make make install /usr/local/ssdb/ssdb-server -d /usr/local/ssdb/ssdb.confps aux |
